#include <stdio.h>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
using std::sort;
int main(){
       int T,M,mid;
       
       scanf("%d",&T);
       
       while(T--)
       {
         scanf("%d",&M);
         int A[M];
         
         for(int i=0;i<M;i++)
           scanf("%d",&A[i]);
         
         if(M%2==0)
           printf("-1\n");
         else
         {
         sort(A,A+M);
         mid = ceil(M/2);
         printf("%d\n",A[mid]);
         }
         }
           return 0;
           }
